Package me.kverna.roger.server.security

Class JwtProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.kverna.roger.server.security.JwtProperties
  • @Configuration
@PropertySource("classpath:application.properties")
@ConfigurationProperties(prefix="jwt")
public class JwtProperties
extends java.lang.Object
    Properties for handling of JSON web tokens.

      How many days a key will be valid for until expiring.

    • Field Detail

      • secret

        private java.lang.String secret
        A secret for the JSON web tokens. If defined, this must be greater than or equal to 256 bits. When the secret is null, the secretAlgorithm will be used.

      • secretAlgorithm

        private java.lang.String secretAlgorithm
        The secret algorithm to use when the secret is null. A secret will be generated using the given algorithm.

      • expirationDays

        private long expirationDays
        How many days a key will be valid for until expiring.

        public java.lang.String getSecret()
        A secret for the JSON web tokens. If defined, this must be greater than or equal to 256 bits. When the secret is null, the secretAlgorithm will be used.

        public void setSecret​(java.lang.String secret)
        A secret for the JSON web tokens. If defined, this must be greater than or equal to 256 bits. When the secret is null, the secretAlgorithm will be used.

      • getSecretAlgorithm

        public java.lang.String getSecretAlgorithm()
        The secret algorithm to use when the secret is null. A secret will be generated using the given algorithm.

        public void setSecretAlgorithm​(java.lang.String secretAlgorithm)
        The secret algorithm to use when the secret is null. A secret will be generated using the given algorithm.
